extendedInfo.description: Become the greatest fighter the world has ever known, harnessing the power of chi to manipulate the energies of the universe. Defeat rivals, find romance, and rise to become the Imperial Champion. Win the right to question the immortal Dragon Sage, who speaks just once every hundred years!Choice of Kung Fu is a fast-paced interactive fantasy novel where your choices determine how the story proceeds. The game is entirely text-based--without graphics or sound effects--but powered by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.The fate of the Middle Kingdom depends on you! Will you play as male or female? Gay or straight? Will you battle against foreign invaders, or will you rise up against the Emperor? What question will you ask the Dragon Sage, the wisest of all creatures?

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Choice of Games always releases interesting games and this One is no exception. I got absorbed in the story in a matter of minutes and it wouldn\'t let me go until the end. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Alexander Biryukov

reviews.title: A certifiable must buy!
reviews.comment: Incredibly imperative with an astounding variety of options! Truly one of the most enjoyable games I\'ve played on at platform.
reviews.author: Kenneth Tobin

reviews.title: Nice story Lil short
reviews.comment: All in all great book the romance plots could be a bit more fleshed out but a wonderful hour of fun.
reviews.author: David Glenn

reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
reviews.comment: Choice of Games have always had good games but lately they have started to become sub-standard. This is now my new favourite.
reviews.author: James Turner

reviews.title: Please marry me, COG.
reviews.comment: My absolute favorite Choice Of Games - hands down. This is the most beautifully woven tale, with rich descriptors, diverse storylines and thoroughly developed characters. More importantly, however, I am so utterly immersed I can feel myself BECOMING the character I create. I love you.
reviews.author: Christina Thorpe

reviews.title: Worth buying!
reviews.comment: Well-thought game with good selection of choices that allow users freedom to go about doing what they want. I just wished that the love prospects would have a bigger impact on the character\'s life for more interaction between the spouse and the player.  Otherwise, great game!
reviews.author: Shannon Yu

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: I have long been a fan of Choice of Games, so I was more than happy to shell out a few bucks after being given so many great apps for free. This one kept me up all night, exploring choices over and over. The one thing I was a little disappointed about is that I was trying to marry the male rival, and wasn\'t able to do so.
reviews.author: Dana Luckett

reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
reviews.comment: I was rather surprised by this game. It reminded me a lot of Jade Empire, though it lacked complexity compared to that game. That\'s not a complaint though. This game was fun to play through. I liked all of the chapters, as well as the questions you could ask at the end, provided you made it that far. It had good characters, a good plot, an interesting world, and several cool romance options. I definitely recommend it.
reviews.author: Jeff Peterson

reviews.title: A fun story with good characters
reviews.comment: My first choice of games. I was rather fond of a few different characters and felt both that my choices had weight and that I had a chance to revisit them when appropriate.
reviews.author: Greg Sanders

reviews.title: Worth it
reviews.comment: Well made
reviews.author: Syed Amir

reviews.title: great game!
reviews.comment: Great story once you get into it. Wide variety of choices and combat styles. Less grammar mistakes then most choice of games apps.
reviews.author: Jonathan MacDonald

reviews.title: A+
reviews.comment: Continue this so i can give you more $
reviews.author: Eric Cunningham

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Needs to be longer
reviews.author: Matt Jimenez

reviews.comment: Kind like Jade Empire from Bioware. The story needs something more. Average overall but its nice for a choice game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Well worth the price. I little bit short, and could use some actual interactions with your spouse once you\'re married. Overall tho, excellent
reviews.author: Brad M

reviews.title: Diamond in the rough
reviews.comment: I love these games but thus I\'ve is one of the few worth buying cause it has variety and is not short, they need to make more games like this
reviews.author: Jose Ortiz

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great storyline! Must play!
reviews.author: Ahmad Firdaus

reviews.title: More
reviews.comment: I want more!!!!! This is such a fun title I want to play more of it.
reviews.author: Kevin Foster

reviews.title: Gladness
reviews.comment: Just trying out the demo of this, I, like all others, could se major improvement. Thank you cog. Better than any EA game has sold alone.
reviews.author: Carsten Nightshade

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love their games! This one is shorter than others but is still well done! Could be more interactivity with characters though.
reviews.author: Nick Hilts
